public class Aquarium
extends java.lang.Object

Aquarium Lab Series: The Aquarium class defines an Aquarium and its properties.

Version:
10 July 2002

Constructor Summary

 boolean validLoc(int xCoord, int yCoord)
          This function determines whether the given coordinates specify a valid location (one that exists within the bounds of the aquarium).
